pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools to Complete Euclidean Distance Matrices // Implements the Euclidean distance matrix completion algorithms of Alfakih, Khandani, and Wolkowicz (1999) doi:10.1023/A:1008655427845, Trosset (2000) doi:10.1023/A:1008722907820, Fang and O'Leary (2012) doi:10.1080/10556788.2011.643888, and Rahman and Oldford (2017) arXiv:1610.06599 the Sensor Network Localization Algorithm of Krislock and Wolkowicz (2010) doi:10.1137/090759392, and the molecular reconstruction algorithm of Alipanahi (2011).
